verbose_text: These results indicated that a highly effective tumor triggered drug release behavior of GNS@CaCO 3 / ICG was occurring, strongly suggesting that the entrapped ICG was gradually being released from the GNS@CaCO 3 / ICG platform as a result of the acidic environment of tumor regions which triggered the decomposition of the CaCO 3 layer.
evidence: ICG platform as a result of the acidic environment of tumor regions which triggered the decomposition of the CaCO 3
